comment.author: 47322785@N08
comment._content: Has to be at least 1878 as there is a horse tram visible crossing from Angas Street into Gouger Street - horse trams didn't commence until 11 June 1878.

comment.author: 92601516@N02
comment._content: Victoria Square is no longer a straight north-south road. It forms a diamond with parkland and the John Dowie fountain taking the place of the original roadway shown in the foreground of this photograph.
